name: Quick Shrimp Chowder

instructions: Melt butter in oven over medium heat; add onion, and saut√© 8 minutes or until tender.
Stir in cream of potato soup, milk, and pepper; bring to a boil.

Serve immediately and can also add oyster crackers.
